name: BottomLine
0:
”Alexa, start Bottom Line”
”Alexa, open Bottom Line”
”Alexa, launch Bottom Line”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bottom line
des:
Bottom Line gives you instant updates about your business from your QuickBooks dashboard.

Whether you need to know your Sales, Expenses, Profit, A/R, or other key numbers in your business – now you can just ask for these key numbers.

Bottom Line will read off a "Voice Briefing" every morning of how your business doing – how much you sold yesterday, how much money was deposited, how much your customers owe you, and much more.

Just enable the Bottom Line skill, and have QuickBooks answers from your Alexa devices.

Powered by Voice Metrics
